com.teamdev.jxbrowser.view.swing.graphics

Class BitmapImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.view.graphics.BitmapImage<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
      • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.view.swing.graphics.BitmapImage

  • public final class BitmapImage
extends BitmapImage<java.awt.image.BufferedImage>
    A Swing-specific implementation that allows getting BufferedImage from Bitmap.
    Since:
    7.7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toToolkit(Bitmap bitmap)
      Creates and returns an instance of BufferedImage obtained from the given bitmap.

      • Methods inherited from class com.teamdev.jxbrowser.view.graphics.BitmapImage

        toolkitImage

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • toToolkit

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage toToolkit(Bitmap bitmap)
        Creates and returns an instance of BufferedImage obtained from the given bitmap. The image will have the same width and height as the bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap used to obtain BufferedImage
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the given bitmap size is empty
